    Plot

    Plot.Rd

    Plot Interface

    Super class

    DarwinShinyModules::ShinyModule -> Plot

    Active bindings

    data

    Data used for plot.

    fun

    Plotting function.

    reactiveValues

    Reactive values.

    Methods

    Public methods

    • Plot$new()

    • Plot$validate()

    • Plot$updateDataReactive()

    • Plot$clone()

    Inherited methods
    • DarwinShinyModules::ShinyModule$UI()
    • DarwinShinyModules::ShinyModule$id()
    • DarwinShinyModules::ShinyModule$server()

    Method new()

    initialize

    Usage

    Plot$new(appId, data, fun)

    Arguments

    appId

    (character(1)) ID of the app, to use for namespacing.

    data

    Data to plot with, usually a data.frame-like object.

    fun

    Function to plot with, with one argument: data.

    Returns

    self

    Method validate()

    Validator method

    Usage

    Plot$validate()

    Returns

    (self)

    Method updateDataReactive()

    Update data within reactive context (reactive() or observe())

    Usage

    Plot$updateDataReactive(data)

    Arguments

    data

    Updated data

    Returns

    self

    Method clone()

    The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

    Usage

    Plot$clone(deep = FALSE)

    Arguments

    deep

    Whether to make a deep clone.
